resources.string:
Anatomy is a memory game in which the game will display an image of an organ and player will be asked to choose one of the possible names. 
 If player has been confident with his choice, then player needs to press the confirm button to proceed to the next image. 
 The given time to guess all images is thirty seconds. 
 After all images have been successfully guessed, the game will return to the home page. 
 Player can select the score menu on the home page to see his last score and his highest score.
